Metadata.Title: i18n in Next.js 15 - Brit Edition
Metadata.Description: Examples for zod, SSR, runtime locale switching, and react-email. Properly British, of course.

Greeting: Wee ahh very bri'ish, innit? Ready to code, love!

Validation.Required: This field’s as necessary as a cup of tea in the morning

String.Email: Email ain't proper if it doesn’t have .co.uk
String.MinLength: That’s shorter than a pint of lager
String.MaxLength: That's longer than a queue at the chippy
